mapper.select: select id, gmt_create as gmtCreate, gmt_modified as gmtModified, user_id as userId, namespace_id as namespaceId, stage_id as stageId, profile from am_user_profile where user_id = #{userId} and namespace_id = #{namespaceId} and stage_id = #{stageId}
mapper.insert: insert into am_user_profile( gmt_create, gmt_modified, user_id, profile, namespace_id, stage_id ) values( now(), now(), #{userId}, #{profile}, #{namespaceId}, #{stageId} )
